properties.transfer_type: "Download" if the DNASC Globus endpoint is the source, else "Upload". Use task document property source_endpoint_id.
properties.bytes_transfered: Current total number of bytes transferred. Use the value of task document property bytes_transferred.
properties.transfer_size: Integer read from label property in the task document
properties.progress_percentage: bytes_transfered / transfer_size * 100, rounded to nearest integer
